articles.title: UK could threaten to pull out of EU's €100bn research programme amid Brexit deal row - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Senior Government sources claim the EU is 'purposely going slow' on formalising the UK’s participation in Horizon Europe
articles.content: The UK secured associate membership to the Horizon programme as part of the Brexit trade deal, enabling British universities, companies and researchers to continue bidding for pan-European funding wi… [+1371 chars]

articles.title: Friendlies round-up: Spain and Portugal locked in stalemate as Alvaro Morata is denied late winner - Sky Sports
articles.description: Spain and Portugal played out an entertaining 0-0 draw on Friday as both sides continue their preparations for this month's European Championship.

articles.author: Callum Hoare
articles.title: EU cracks show after China’s ‘friend’ Hungary breaks ranks to strike deal with Beijing - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN UNION's cracks are showing after 'friendly' Hungary broke ranks to work with China, and now Beijing's foreign minister has boasted of improved relations with Ireland, Serbia and Poland.

articles.content: The European Union on Friday banned Belarus airlines from flying over EU territory or landing in its airports in response to the Belarus government's forced landing of a Ryanair plane to arrest journ… [+1393 chars]

articles.author: Vicky Qiao
articles.title: Thomas King wins $15K Stephen Leacock Medal for Humour for Indians on Vacation - CBC.ca
articles.description: Indians on Vacation is about a couple named Bird and Mimi, who decide to travel through Europe after discovering postcards from Mimi's long-lost Uncle Leroy.
articles.content:
Thomas King has won the 2021 Stephen Leacock Memorial Medal for Humour for his novel Indians on Vacation
.
The $15,000 prize recognizes the best humour writing in Canada.
Indians on Vacation is ab… [+2071 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: EU and UK open antitrust investigations into Facebook Marketplace - The Verge
articles.description: The European Commission and UK’s Competition and Markets Authority have opened an investigation into Facebook Marketplace. There are concerns Facebook is unfairly using advertiser data to compete with rivals.
articles.content:
Regulators are concerned about Facebooks control of classified ads
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge

articles.title: Realme to Launch 5G Smartphones Under Rs 10,000 in 2022, Madhav Sheth Confirms - MySmartPrice
articles.description: At the Realme 5G summit, the company’s India and Europe CEO said that the sub-Rs 10,000 5G phone is its big market expansion plan.
